runs.comm: starts with a hint of awayswing outside off which beats Nicol coming forward to defend
comes down the track and is cramped for room, squeezed out into the leg side to get off the mark
Guptill defends his first ball on off solidly down the pitch
Guptill gets forward a touch late to a full ball on off but is able to push to cover off the middle of the bat
gets forward and defends another accurate ball on middle and off, tidy start by South Africa here
gets off the mark without moving his feet, it was full on middle and Guptill tried to flick through the leg side and got a leading edge which skewed wide of any fielder down to third man
starts on leg and tucked away nicely into the leg side
gets forward and defends a ball angling across on off
charges down, Tsotsobe sees him and drops it short, Nicol manages to play it down through short leg

short and wide outside off and he didn't really move his feet as his hands did the work, slapped it straight down the ground past mid-off, even then he didn't middle it and certainly wasn't aiming to hit it in that region
comes down the wicket and pulls through midwicket into the deep
ooh bangs it in outside off and Nicol thinks of dabbing it over the keeper before withdrawing
full outside off and Guptill slices the loft over the covers with enough timing for it to reach the boundary
rocks back and pulls with all his might, it was short outside off and Guptill hits this better as it sails over the ropes at long-on
plays this down to mid-on
defends a good length ball on off back down the pitch
again defends with a slightly open stance into the leg side, Nicol happy to be circumspect at the moment

I think that's a drop but whether it was ever humanly possible for AB to catch that behind the stumps is debatable, Nicol got forward to a full length ball outside off and got a thick outside edge which nipped the gloves of AB standing up and rolled through third man
punched into the off side and Duminy can't collect cleanly as they take a single
walks forward and tries to open the face on it but it beats him with the angle across
comes down the track and loses patience, goes for a swing into orbit but only his head gets up there as the ball goes through to AB
a touch short outside off and Nicol finally latches on to one and times the pull well past mid-on and to the boundary
again walks down and slaps a short ball outside off down the ground, mid-off dives low to his right and manages to cut it off, Morne Morkel doing great work there to get down from his height
full outside off and driven to extra cover, Botha's throw at the bowler's end misses with Guptill frantically trying to make his ground
shortish outside off and Guptill tries to whizz a cut through point but his lack of feet movement means he isn't close enough to it
this is full on off and Guptill smacks it back at Morne, who doesn't know too much about it but manages to stop it with his hand
143kph outside off and Guptill is late on the attempted pull through midwicket, doesn't make contact
gets forward and mistimes a smear to a shortish ball towards mid-on
full and fired into leg at 145kph, hits the back pad but sliding down and it rolls away fine
Nicol is forward to defend a good length ball on off into the covers
gets forward and he defends into the covers

that is a monstrous blow, the radio commentators are falling off their chairs shrieking in delight, it was short outside off and Guptill waited for it before taking a step down the track and pulling with immense force well back into the midwicket stands
tapped into the off side to get off strike
gets forward and defends into the covers and they pinch a single

this is an even bigger blow, Guptill gets under a half-volley on middle and launches it all the way onto the roof of the stand there at midwicket, it bounces back into the stadium and Guptill is carrying on from where he left off against Zimbabwe, whom he plundered for five consecutive fifties
played to backward point
gets forward and sweeps behind square
full on middle and eased down the ground to long-on
plants his foot outside off and swings a ball outside off from the hip on the bounce to deep midwicket
full on middle and driven back on the ground to the bowler
gets down and sweeps a ball on middle to backward square
and he strikes straight away! South Africa really needed that, Nicol got underneath a full ball on middle and skied it towards long-on, Amla ran around well from long-on to take a good running catch
slips this well down leg and is wided
good ball on middle and leg thuds into the pad, looked to be going down and rightly not given
Guptill is cramped for room as he forces a ball on off to backward point
full on the pads and clipped straight to short fine leg, Albie hits direct at the bowler's end but Guptill was home
full toss on the pads is clipped to deep backward square, but the real crime is that he's bowled a front-foot no-ball, and Guptill is on strike for the free hit!
gets underneath a full ball on middle but doesn't get the timing right and it skies up and plops down three-quarters of the way there, Amla doesn't bother to catch it and they steal a couple
opens the face on a ball on off and dabs backward of point
too short from Botha on middle and Guptill pulls over the head of midwicket and out to the boundary
gets forward and defends to off
full toss on leg which he works to long-on
full outside off and he chops the square drive into the deep, top dive on the boundary rope cuts it off
another full toss on leg is clipped to deep fine leg, and the dreaded no-ball virus makes a comeback for Morne Morkel, who had problems with his front foot in the home series against Sri Lanka
short outside off and he swings hard but misses as Morne gets off the hook
tucked off the hips softly backward of square, ball barely trickled to the edge of the circle
flicked away through the leg side
lofts a full ball on middle cleanly down the ground over the bowler's head and into the sightscreen to bring up his sixth consecutive fifty for New Zealand
short ball on off which he guides behind point
defends down the pitch solidly
full on leg and worked down to long-on
defends down the pitch to Botha
waits in the crease and clips off the pads through square leg
pushes this into the covers
full on the stumps and driven to long-on
on middle and leg and he clips it away to deep backward square
waist high full toss on leg is flicked fine, lucky not to be called there
charges down the track and has to reach outside off to slice it inside out over the infield out towards deep point, where third man runs round to collect
very wide down leg and he somehow gets bat to ball and flicks it to deep fine leg, would have been wide had he let it go
full outside off and digs it out towards mid-on
pushed into the covers as he is squared up a touch
eased off the back foot into the covers
bowled 'em! Feet stuck in concrete there, it was outside off and he didn't quite have the room to cut as he bottom edged it into the stumps via pad flap
tucks his first ball off the pads through square leg
full outside off and smacks it down to long-off
gets forward on middle and, not without a hint of risk, wristily whips it through square leg
Guptill showing he can be delicate as well, goes back and back-cuts with excellent placement backward of point
goes back and plays it down towards mid-on
they almost had Kane there, he pulled on the front foot and sliced it high towards midwicket where Botha was late in spotting it and dived forward to collect it on the bounce
punches off the front foot to long-on to bring up the 100 for New Zealand
goes back and slaps to Duminy at backward point who flings himself to his left brilliantly to cut it off
drills a half-volley outside off back down the ground past the bowler
rocks back and pulls a short ball outside off out to cow corner where he bisects the fielders in the deep
fuller outside off and he works it back to the bowler with a wristy flick
comes down the track and launches it towards cow corner where it bounces millimetres short of the rope, South Africa slipping now
full on middle and worked away through midwicket
full toss on the pads and he slams it straight to deep square leg
gets forward and chips in the air to long-on
short and pulled away into the leg side
plays into the covers
swinging into the pads down leg, misses the flick and it rolls to third man
goes back and punches to mid-on

dropped down at his feet from a short length, rolls behind the stumps where AB quickly throws the stumps down with Kane stretching back after stepping out to think of a run, there is a frame in it but he seems to be safe by a very small margin
skied high in the air beyond the edge of the circle at mid-off and Tsotsobe running back can't get a hand to it
misses the pull and hits the protective equipment, drops on the pitch and Guptill runs through and puts in a full-length dive to get home
fired in way down leg and he doesn't need to play at that
backs away and uppercuts a short ball outside off over the ring to the backward point boundary

poor call by Kane there, flicked straight to short midwicket and he sets off, Albie Morkel charges in and picks up before swivelling and throwing down the stumps at the bowler's end with Kane having already given up
fired in full on leg, beats the poke and hits the pad on leg, possibly going down as the umpire turns down a loud appeal, meanwhile they sneak a run
full on off and smeared across the line into the midwicket region
de Grandhomme goes for a swing to leg and the ball gets tangled up in his pads and dribbles down the wicket as they rush through
full on middle and Guptill plays with an incredibly straight backlift and followthrough as he gets it just past the stumps down the ground into the deep
a sharp bouncer on off at 139kph which smashes into the helmet of Guptill. He goes down quickly but is back up soon and reassures everyone he is ok, second player hit in the head tonight after Levi
and follows up with a flat batted smack down the ground over the boundary at mid-off

de Grandhomme tries to finish it early with a six over midwicket, but skies the pull high into the deep where Levi, described by David Leggat in the New Zealand Herald as having the 'build of a prop', takes the catch safely and gives the fans some words
smacks a full ball down the ground to long-off
dabs into the off side to get off the mark
backs away and mistimes the slice down the ground to long-off on the bounce
tries to bang it in short on middle but it sits up and Franklin opens the face and guides it to third man
drives a full ball down to long-on and Guptill is as fast as a hare and they push through for a couple, run-a-ball needed from the final over
full on middle and driven down the ground by Franklin, well placed and they get back for a couple

New Zealand wrap it up in comprehensive fashion! Franklin drills a full ball outside off through the covers and it rolls over the rope as the home side take out the 1st Twenty20 International by 6 wickets
